text: DXSM (774 AM) Radyo Pilipinas is a radio station owned and operated by Philippine Broadcasting Service. The station's studio is located in Camp Asturias, Brgy. Asturias, Jolo, Sulu.Radyo ng Bayan in Sulu province gets new faceliftSulu gov inaugurates renovated Radyo Ng Bayan buildingSultan Fuad Kiram is the true and legitimate Sultan of Sulu ==References== Category:Philippine Broadcasting Service Category:Radio stations in Sulu
title: DXSM
